original_theorem:
If $f$ is differentiable at $\mathbf{X}_0,$ then $f$
is continuous at $\mathbf{X}_0$.
theorem_translation:
```lean4

    {ğ•œ : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField ğ•œ]
    {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ğ•œ E]
    {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ğ•œ F]
    {f : E â†’ F} {Xâ‚€ : E}
    (h : DifferentiableAt ğ•œ f Xâ‚€) :
    ContinuousAt f Xâ‚€ := by
```

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem differentiable_at_implies_continuous_at
    {ğ•œ : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField ğ•œ]
    {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ğ•œ E]
    {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ğ•œ F]
    {f : E â†’ F} {Xâ‚€ : E}
    (h : DifferentiableAt ğ•œ f Xâ‚€) :
    ContinuousAt f Xâ‚€ := by sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
â€¢ The linear map L is given by L(X - Xâ‚€) = m â‹… (X - Xâ‚€) [def_1].
â€¢ M is the Euclidean norm of the vector m [def_4].
Therefore, we conclude:
â€¢ |L(X - Xâ‚€)| â‰¤ M |X - Xâ‚€| [l1].
proof_steps.lean_tactics:
let m := fderiv ğ•œ f Xâ‚€
  have l1 (x : E) : â€–m xâ€– â‰¤ â€–mâ€– * â€–xâ€– := m.le_opNorm x

attempt_history.verified_code:
import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem differentiable_at_implies_continuous_at
    {ğ•œ : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField ğ•œ]
    {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ğ•œ E]
    {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ğ•œ F]
    {f : E â†’ F} {Xâ‚€ : E}
    (h : DifferentiableAt ğ•œ f Xâ‚€) :
    ContinuousAt f Xâ‚€ := by
  let m := fderiv ğ•œ f Xâ‚€
  have l1 (x : E) : â€–m xâ€– â‰¤ â€–mâ€– * â€–xâ€– := m.le_opNorm x
  sorry

proof_steps.natural_language:
We assume:
â€¢ The definition of differentiability states f(X) - f(Xâ‚€) = L(X - Xâ‚€) + E(X)|X - Xâ‚€| [def_2].
â€¢ The term |L(X - Xâ‚€)| is bounded by M |X - Xâ‚€| [l1].
Therefore, we conclude:
â€¢ |f(X) - f(Xâ‚€)| â‰¤ (M + |E(X)|) |X - Xâ‚€| [l2].
proof_steps.lean_tactics:
have l2 (x : E) : â€–f x - f Xâ‚€â€– â‰¤ â€–mâ€– * â€–x - Xâ‚€â€– + â€–f x - f Xâ‚€ - m (x - Xâ‚€)â€– := by
  rw [add_comm]
  calc â€–f x - f Xâ‚€â€–
    _ â‰¤ â€–f x - f Xâ‚€ - m (x - Xâ‚€)â€– + â€–m (x - Xâ‚€)â€– :=
        norm_le_sub_add_norm (f x - f Xâ‚€) (m (x - Xâ‚€))
    _ â‰¤ â€–f x - f Xâ‚€ - m (x - Xâ‚€)â€– + â€–mâ€– * â€–x - Xâ‚€â€– :=
        add_le_add_left (l1 (x - Xâ‚€)) _

import Mathlib
import Aesop

set_option maxHeartbeats 0
open BigOperators Real Nat Topology Rat Filter
theorem differentiable_at_implies_continuous_at
    {ğ•œ : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField ğ•œ]
    {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ğ•œ E]
    {F : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup F] [NormedSpace ğ•œ F]
    {f : E â†’ F} {Xâ‚€ : E}
    (h : DifferentiableAt ğ•œ f Xâ‚€) :
    ContinuousAt f Xâ‚€ := by
  let m := fderiv ğ•œ f Xâ‚€
  have l1 (x : E) : â€–m xâ€– â‰¤ â€–mâ€– * â€–xâ€– := m.le_opNorm x
have l2 (x : E) : â€–f x - f Xâ‚€â€– â‰¤ â€–mâ€– * â€–x - Xâ‚€â€– + â€–f x - f Xâ‚€ - m (x - Xâ‚€)â€– := by
  rw [add_comm]
  calc â€–f x - f Xâ‚€â€–
    _ â‰¤ â€–f x - f Xâ‚€ - m (x - Xâ‚€)â€– + â€–m (x - Xâ‚€)â€– :=
        norm_le_sub_add_norm (f x - f Xâ‚€) (m (x - Xâ‚€))
    _ â‰¤ â€–f x - f Xâ‚€ - m (x - Xâ‚€)â€– + â€–mâ€– * â€–x - Xâ‚€â€– :=
        add_le_add_left (l1 (x - Xâ‚€)) _
  sorry

theorem differentiable_at_implies_continuous_at
    {ğ•œ : Type*} [NontriviallyNormedField ğ•œ]

    (h : DifferentiableAt ğ•œ f Xâ‚€) :
    ContinuousAt f Xâ‚€ := by
  let m := fderiv ğ•œ f Xâ‚€
  have l1 (x : E) : â€–m xâ€– â‰¤ â€–mâ€– * â€–xâ€– := m.le_opNorm x
have l2 (x : E) : â€–f x - f Xâ‚€â€– â‰¤ â€–mâ€– * â€–x - Xâ‚€â€– + â€–f x - f Xâ‚€ - m (x - Xâ‚€)â€– := by

    _ â‰¤ â€–f x - f Xâ‚€ - m (x - Xâ‚€)â€– + â€–mâ€– * â€–x - Xâ‚€â€– :=
        add_le_add_left (l1 (x - Xâ‚€)) _
  sorry
